## Description {#details}

<a href="/docs/api/classes/anonymous-namespace-legacypassmanager-cpp-/mppassmanager">MPPassManager</a> manages ModulePasses and function pass managers.

It batches all <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/module">Module</a> passes and function pass managers together and sequences them to process one module.

Definition at line 381 of file <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/ir/legacypassmanager-cpp">LegacyPassManager.cpp</a>.

### addLowerLevelRequiredPass() {#a452b3946fae687fe6ab129970b5f9c75}

  labels = {["virtual"]}>
Add RequiredPass into list of lower level passes required by pass P.

RequiredPass is run on the fly by Pass Manager when P requests it through getAnalysis interface.

### getOnTheFlyPass() {#a887a8078ca0523b9494da138a800bb65}

<MemberDefinition

  labels = {["virtual"]}>
Return function pass corresponding to <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/passinfo">PassInfo</a> PI, that is required by module pass MP.

Instantiate analysis pass, by using its <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/transforms/lib/transforms/utils/entryexitinstrumenter-cpp/#a3985f1f39349428d17f0d2b81ebc6349">runOnFunction()</a> for function F.

### runOnModule() {#a15f0d5cca56f2c4cc4f59bc85803233a}

<MemberDefinition
  prototype={<>bool MPPassManager::runOnModule (<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/module">Module</a> &amp; M)</>}>
run - Execute all of the passes scheduled for execution.

Execute all of the passes scheduled for execution by invoking runOnModule method.

Keep track of whether any of the passes modifies the module, and if so, return true.

Definition at line <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/ir/legacypassmanager-cpp/#l00402">402</a> of file <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/ir/legacypassmanager-cpp">LegacyPassManager.cpp</a>.

<MemberDefinition

Collection of on the fly FPPassManagers.

These managers manage function passes that are required by module passes.
